author: Pierre-Louis JAEGER <pjr@devalgo.com>
description: Compiler to generate playable HTML wireframe site from layout description model (LOM)
name: @opentech-ux/lom-compiler

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run model:generate && npm run build:ts
scripts.pkg:create: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.publish:major: npm run pkg:create && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run pkg:create && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:patch: npm run pkg:create && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run test:mocha && npm run test:prettier
scripts.test:coverage: nyc --report-dir .nyc_output/html -r html -r text -x "tests/*.test.ts" npm run test:mocha
